name: Raging Fury
description: The flame lives in our veins, warming our hearts! The fury burns in our souls, illuminating our faith! The rage and hatred melts our weapons, igniting our foes!
effect: If you have slain an adversary earlier this turn, add 1 to the result of your attack rolls.
additionalEffect: this bonus can take place more than once (+1 for each adversary slain), to a maximum of 1+.
